name: Zillertaler Mander Festival 2017
description:
Program:

Thursday, 20th July:

Welcome evening with CD presentation of the new album 2017 at the Brückenstadl in Mayrhofen.
Start: 6.30 p.m., free entry, live with: the Alpis!

Friday, 21st July:

Guided hike to the Talbachstüberl in Laimach. The Kasermandl Duo provides the best atmosphere. Of course, the Zillertal Mander will act as a guide and be there.
Fan hike only possible by pre-registration (www.zillertaler-mander.at or +43 664 4540738).

From 8 p.m.:
Chris & Albin Zillertaler Mander present young musicians from the Alps at the festival area

Saturday, July 22nd:

Great festival in Zell am Ziller at the festival area
Inlet: 4.00 p.m. | Start: 5.00 p.m.
Children up to 15 years free entry!
Admission € 13, -

Acts:
Unterland Echo
Melanie Payer
Die Fetzig'n
Francine Jordi
Moderator Alex Weber from ORF Radio Tirol

Concert of the Zillertal Mander from 9.00 p.m.

Aftershowparty in the disco tent with DJ Mox

Sunday, 23rd July:
Musically brunch at the festival area, start at 10.30 a.m.

Moderation Ingo Rotter from Radio U1 Tirol
Tirolerisch gspielt
Tirol echo
Die Pfundskerle
Zillertal Mander
Admission: € 5, -
Children up to 15 years free!

Subject to change!

Tickets pre sale:

Combined ticket from 16 years: € 20, -
Ticket only for Saturday from 16 years: € 11, -

Tourismusverband Mayrhofen- Hippach
Ticket@mayrhofen.at or 05285 6760
